name: Mawlid Greeting Card
description:
Happy Holiday!
10/20/21

23 or 24 October 2021

RGB



مَولِد
مولد النبي

You will see the day referred to as
Mawlid, Mawlid an-Nabī, Milad-un-Nabi, Maulid Nabi, Maulud, Mulud - Muludan, Havliye, Donba and a number of variations on these names.

However you term the celebration, it is there to mark the Prophet’s birth and so is a very important day for the Islamic faith.

There are some discrepancies among different Sunni and Shi’a Muslim scholars as to the exact date of the Prophet Muhammad’s birthday, with Sunni’s using the 12th day of Rabi’ al-awwal and the Shi’a using the 17th day.

It also changes quite significantly from one year to another as the Muslim calendar is a lunar one, meaning it is based on sightings of the Crescent Moon after the New Moon.

In some years it can be celebrated as early as mid-October, but in others it is marked as late as December.



*
Messages;

Happy Mawlid Al-Nabi 1443 H. With this celebration of the Prophet's Birthday, let's imitate the morals of the Prophet in everyday in life.
Selamat Maulid Nabi 1442 H, dengan perayaan Maulid Nabi mari teladani akhlak Rasulullah dalam kehidupan sehari-hari.

Happy Mawlid Al-Nabi SAW 1443 H. The joy has come with the birth of the guide of the straight path.
Selamat Maulid Nabi saw 1442 H. Kegembiraan telah datang dengan kelahiran sang petunjuk jalan yang lurus.

The birthday of the Prophet Muhammad, can be used as a moment to increase love, prioritize truth, strengthen brotherhood and uphold tolerance. Happy Mawlid Al-Nabi for you and family.
Maulid Nabi Muhammad SAW, dapat dijadikan sebagai momen meningkatkan kasih sayang, mengutamakan kebenaran, mempererat tali persaudaraan serta menjunjung tinggi toleransi. Selamat Maulid Nabi untukmu dan keluarga.

May you celebrate the occasion of Mawlid Al Nabi offering prayers to Allah, spending time with your loved ones. Happy Mawlid Al Nabi.
Semoga Anda merayakan kesempatan Maulid Nabi dengan memanjatkan doa kepada Allah, menghabiskan waktu bersama orang yang Anda cintai. Selamat Maulid Nabi.

Sending warm greetings to you and your loved ones on Mawlid Al Nabi.
Mengirim salam hangat untuk Anda dan orang yang Anda cintai di Maulid Al Nabi.

May we're always close to him as he is close to Allah and to us. Don't forget to do shalawat, akhi & ukhti. Happy Mawlid Al-Nabi 1443 H.
Semoga kita selalu dekat dengannya sebagaimana dia dekat dengan Allah dan kita. Jangan lupa untuk melakukan shalawat, akhi & ukhti. Selamat Maulid Nabi 1443 H.

I give thanks to Allah SWT. Because, there is no better gift from Him than the birth of the Prophet Muhammad. Happy Mawlid Al-Nabi for you, my friend.
Puji syukur kupanjatkan kepada Allah SWT. Sebab, tiada hadiah yang lebih baik dari-Nya daripada kelahiran Nabi Muhammad SAW. Selamat merayakan Maulid Nabi untukmu, sahabatku.

Happy Birthday of the Prophet 1443 H! Let's make the moment of commemorating the birth of the Prophet Muhammad SAW to imitate noble character.
Selamat Maulid Nabi 1443 H! Mari jadikan momen peringatan kelahiran Nabi Muhammad SAW untuk meneladani akhlak mulia.

Joy has shone brightly from the birth of the role model of the Prophet. Happy Birthday of Prophet Muhammad SAW 1443 H!
Kegembiraan telah bersinar terang dari kelahiran sang suri tauladan Rasulullah. Selamat Maulid Nabi Muhammad SAW 1443 H!

May the blessings of Allah never stop shining upon you and your family! We wish you a Happy Mawlid Al-Nabi 2021!
Semoga berkah Allah tidak pernah berhenti menyinari Anda dan keluarga! Kami mengucapkan Selamat Maulid Nabi 2021!



Hope Mawlid al-Nabi Brings Peace, Blessings And Joy To You And Your Family :)
